This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters

                <string name="colorize_notification_title">Colorize notifications</string>
          
          
            
                <string name="colorize_notification_summary">Use Androids feature to set the color of the notification according to the main color of the thumbnail</string>
          
          
            
                <string name="notification_colorize_title">Colorize notification</string>
          
          
            
                <string name="notification_colorize_summary">Have Android cusomize the notification's color according to the main color in the thumbnail (note that this is not available on all devices)</string>
          
      
    
    
  

Also maybe add a note about the fact that some Android versions and UIs never colorize the notification.

nodes.bodyText: Oh, maybe this setting should also be hidden on API <21, since on pre-Lollipop we are sure notifications won't be colorized (I can't find the exact Android version where colorized notifications were added, so I'm assuming Lollipop, if you can find more precise information then use that one)
